item.description:
Looking forward to the long holiday weekend but not sure what you're going to do? Join us for a repeat event at Murphy & Scarletti's at the Exchange in Farmington.

It's a fantastic place to mingle, play pool, dance your heart out or just sit back and watch. We had such a great time last weekend we have scheduled another one for Thanksgiving weekend. If you're able to make it please do. There is usually a cover charge after 9pm of about $5-$10, so come a little early. We met even more new people there while hanging out.

The band Pandemonium is playing that night and they are well known in the area, one of our favorites. Check out their website http://www.pdmrocks.c....

Please feel free to contact me at 860-614-9367 if you have any questions.

Christie

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy
